Most P ­ eople Are Not WEIRD

29. WEIRD is an acronym for Western, educated, and from industrialized, rich, and demo­cratic countries. In other words, theories of mind are built on data from white twenty-­something college students who may or may not be representative enough from which to draw general conclusions about ­human nature and cognition
